name: Ignitus Dead Paw - The Revenge
description:
## Story

Humankind did not listen to Scientists, but to FoxNews, TinFoilHats and Repliloids instead. The climate disaster did take place exactly as predicted by the scientists and Iginitus Dead Paw wakes up from his hibernation in this dystopian world.

During his hibernation Ignitus Dead Paw has received some "upgrades" without recognizing. The upgrades were done by a odd shaman named Pingu Shaman. These upgrades were meant to help Ignitus Dead Paw during is upcoming mission.
Humankind did not change it's behavior even when facing the impacts of the climate disaster and continues to grow the economy using "clean coal" and "clean gas".
Ignitus Dead Paw dedicated it's life the fight against the destruction of the environment, or is he/she/it only hungry and clumsy?

## Task
Sabotage the Industry, to stop it form killing the Nature.
Cameras and Alarms are evil.
Radioactive Ground is also evil.
Guards are evil.
Industry is evil.

## Controls
W,A,S,D - Move
Space - Jump
Ctrl - Crouch
E - Use/Sabotage
MouseButtonLeft - Fire Snowball (if you have one)
